p: The dominant plant species are semishrubs such as teresken and sagebrush ( Artemisia spp.); grasses (e.g., Poa spp. , Festuca spp. , Hordeum spp. , Elymus spp.); sedges ( Carex spp. and Kobresia spp.); and forbs (e.g., Dracocephalum spp., Oxytropis spp., Astragalus spp., Acantholimon spp., Crepis flexuosa, and Potentilla pamirica) (Valdez etÂ al., 2016).
